title: Long distance boyfriend surprises his girlfriend by showing up for her homecoming dance
text:
A long distance boyfriend left his girlfriend in tears after he showed up for her homecoming dance as a heartwarming surprise.

The romantic gesture was caught on camera by a woman, who sounds like she is the teenage girl's mother, when all the students were outside the venue in Willard, Ohio, taking pictures ahead of the dance.

Footage shows the teenager getting read to pin a boutonniere on another guy's jacket who stepped in as her date because her boyfriend lives somewhere else.

Ready to go: One teenager from Willard, Ohio, was expecting to attend homecoming with a friend because her boyfriend is long distance

Shocked: But she received a pleasant surprise when he showed up outside of the venue

The woman who is believed to be the girl's mom is heard saying, 'I offered to fly him here.'

At this moment, the girl looked just beyond the camera to see her boyfriend walking up towards the venue all dressed ready for the dance.

Her eyes instantly filled up with tears once she realized that her boyfriend, who she thought was unable to come, actually was in town for the homecoming dance.

In the footage, the camera then follows the girl as she walks towards her boyfriend carrying roses for her and dressed ready to attend the event.

Someone probably informed the boyfriend about what his girlfriend would be wearing because he was in a black button-up shirt, pants, and maroon bow tie.

This complimented outfit choice her strappy maroon dress perfectly.

Surprise! The long distance boyfriend was carrying roses and was dressed for the dance

Emotional moment: Once she saw him, the girl got tears in her eyes and instantly went over for a hug

Great night: It appears the surprise was a coordinated effort as the boy's outfit matched that of his girlfriend's for the homecoming dance

The couple gave each other an emotional hug while other students and parents looked on during the reunion.

'I have goosebumps,' one woman is heard saying in the background.

The girlfriend appears emotional upon seeing her boyfriend again, who implores her not to cry because of their reunion.

Footage of the heartwarming reunion then ends with the teenager getting ready to pin the boutonniere on her boyfriend's chest before entering the dance.
description: One teenager from Willard, Ohio, was expecting to attend homecoming with a friend because her boyfriend is long distance.
